primary.context: caller played a recording or spoke a message that sounded like a system prompt
primary.detail: The caller played a recorded message back to the AI and then disconnected.

steps: Caller played a recorded message stating no one is available.
Agent attempted to re-engage and ask for a name.

failure.detail: Caller played a recording back to the agent and did not provide a request.

insights.summary: The caller played a recorded message back to the AI agent and then hung up without stating a request.
insights.verbatim: It seems like no one is available to take your call at the moment.
